00039 #ifndef MERSENNETWISTER_H_
00040 #define MERSENNETWISTER_H_
00041 
00042 #include "RandomDeviate.h"
00043 
00044 const double LongIntegerToDouble = 1.0 / 4294967296.0;
00045 
00046 class MersenneTwister : public RandomDeviate
00047 {
00048         
00049 public:
00050     MersenneTwister( unsigned long seedValue = 5489UL, long int randomNumberArraySize = 1000000 );
00051     MersenneTwister( const unsigned long* seedArray, int seedArraySize, long int randomNumberArraySize = 1000000 );
00052     virtual ~MersenneTwister( );
00053     void FillArray( double* array, const unsigned long arraySize ); 
00054     unsigned long RandomUInt();
00055  
00056 private:
00057    enum { N = 624, M = 397 };
00058    
00059    unsigned long m_state[N];
00060    int m_p;
00061    bool m_init; 
00062 
00063    void Seed( unsigned long seedValue ); 
00064    void Seed( const unsigned long* seedArray, int arraySize);
00065    unsigned long int RandomInteger( );
00066    double Random01( );
00067    unsigned long Twiddle( unsigned long u, unsigned long v );
00068    void GenerateNewState();
00069   
00070    MersenneTwister( const MersenneTwister& );
00071    void operator=( const MersenneTwister& );
00072    
00073 };
00074 
00075 inline MersenneTwister::MersenneTwister( unsigned long seedValue, long int randomNumberArraySize )
00076 : RandomDeviate( randomNumberArraySize ), m_p(0)
00077 {
00078         Seed( seedValue ); 
00079     m_init = true;
00080 }
00081 
00082 inline MersenneTwister::MersenneTwister( const unsigned long* seedArray, int seedArraySize, long int randomNumberArraySize  )
00083 : RandomDeviate( randomNumberArraySize ), m_p(0)
00084 {
00085     Seed( seedArray, seedArraySize );
00086     m_init = true;      
00087 }
00088 
00089 inline MersenneTwister::~MersenneTwister( )
00090 {
00091 }
00092 
00093 inline void MersenneTwister::FillArray( double* array, const unsigned long arraySize )
00094 {
00095     for( unsigned int i = 0; i < arraySize; i++ ) array[i] = Random01( );
00096 }
00097 
00098 inline unsigned long MersenneTwister::Twiddle( unsigned long u, unsigned long v )
00099 {
00100     return ( ( ( u & 0x80000000UL ) | ( v & 0x7FFFFFFFUL ) ) >> 1 ) 
00101            ^ ( ( v & 1UL) ? 0x9908B0DFUL : 0x0UL );
00102 }
00103 
00104 inline unsigned long int MersenneTwister::RandomInteger( )
00105 {
00106   if ( m_p == N ) GenerateNewState(); // new state vector needed
00107   unsigned long x = m_state[m_p++];
00108   x ^= (x >> 11);
00109   x ^= (x << 7) & 0x9D2C5680UL;
00110   x ^= (x << 15) & 0xEFC60000UL;
00111   return x ^ (x >> 18);
00112 }
00113 
00114 inline double MersenneTwister::Random01( )
00115 {
00116         return ( static_cast<double>( RandomInteger() ) + 0.5) * LongIntegerToDouble; // divided by 2^32
00117 }
00118 
00119 #endif
